raw_body: DE SILVA – Mrs. ARUMADURA VINITAMALI,​ (Retired Teacher of Devi Balika Vidyalaya,​ Colombo). Beloved Wife of the late Clement Mendis (Licensed Surveyor,​ Justice of the Peace),​ loving Mother of Ushani,​ Lt. Cdr. Kaushal and Asia,​ loving daughter of the late Edin and the late Somawathi De Silva of “Silumini”,​ Kaluwamodara,​ Aluthgama,​ daughter-in-law of the late Tharalis and the late Sauniya Mendis of Rathgama,​ sister of Dr Wanigasiri,​ Indra Kalyani,​ Anurusiri and Sankalal,​ mother-in law of Ushan,​ Buddhika and Dudley,​ much loved grandmother of Rushith,​ Rushni,​ Bhashitha and Selena,​ sister-in-law of Suwineetha,​ Mala and late Padma,​ sister-in-law of the late Seebel,​ the late Commodore Lionel,​ Dhammika,​ the late Gayni,​ Flora,​ the late Shanthi,​ Lalani and the late Lakshmi. The remains lie at the residence 139/​13,​ Darshana Mawatha,​ Pannipitiya Road,​ Battaramulla. Cremation will be held at 5.00 p.m. on Thursday 8th of February 2024 at Thalahena Public Cemetery.
